Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReinforcementTest
public class Player extends Object
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of a Player in the game
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jay Bhatt, Madhav Anadkat, Bhargav Fofandi

      public boolean stationAdditionalArmiesFromPlayer(int p_ArmyNumber)
      Checks whether to deploy the armies or not
      Parameters:
      p_ArmyNumber - army number
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful and false if number of army provided by user is greater than remaining armies of the player or army provided by user is negative
